SiOHN BANCROFT, having removed from


~ Brndywne bridge, to Providence Facto-
ry, Delaware Co. Pa, takes this means to in
form his friends and the public generally, that
he there continues the Carling of Wool, for all
those who are pleased to favor him with their
custom; ard that he hopes by strict attention and
punctuality, to merit continuance of pub
lie patronage. He also takes this opportunity
10 inform those to whose favor lie was indebted
for work inths line, while at Rrandywine Bridge,
that all wool left forh him to card, atJohn Torbert's
Store, Or at the soap Factory of Drainton & Ban
croft, wilmington, or at VIM. M'Cauley's store,
Brandy Sine, will be taken from thence onue ev.
cry week, and, being carded, will be punctually
etunred the week following; hoping, by the
boye arrangement, and punctually in the return
and good performance of the work confded ia
him, they may be induced to continue their ia

full articles.headline: WOOL CARDING.
full articles.article:
SiOHN BANCROFT, having removed from


~ Brndywne bridge, to Providence Facto-
ry, Delaware Co. Pa, takes this means to in
form his friends and the public generally, that
he there continues the Carling of Wool, for all
those who are pleased to favor him with their
custom; ard that he hopes by strict attention and
punctuality, to merit continuance of pub
lie patronage. He also takes this opportunity
10 inform those to whose favor lie was indebted
for work inths line, while at Rrandywine Bridge,
that all wool left forh him to card, atJohn Torbert's
Store, Or at the soap Factory of Drainton & Ban
croft, wilmington, or at VIM. M'Cauley's store,
Brandy Sine, will be taken from thence onue ev.
cry week, and, being carded, will be punctually
etunred the week following; hoping, by the
boye arrangement, and punctually in the return
and good performance of the work confded ia
him, they may be induced to continue their ia
YOURS.


fthmo ., l827. 29--3m.

This NATEnisG PLkrE is iinely suatcd in
the high and healthy country, five milc4 west Of
Wilmington, commanding an extensive view Of
the surrounding country, the River Delaware and
the neighboring States. The Grounds Of tie
compan, afford pleasant and s.ady promcrasits,
and are bounded by fire stream,


The virtues Of the Waters a,- those ol Tie pltI'
est Chalybeatc, according to the anal sis Pro
f,.ssor Heating, Of Phila,lclphia They haye been
particularly eihcacious in bilious ami other fe-
ycrs, and are celebrated as a hHc tonic.


The vicinity TO Wilmington, Oilers At all times,
access to All excellent markets and the daily n
tercourse by Steam Boat lines between that
place and Newcastle, TO and from Philadclp phia
and Baltimore, affords facility Of communica-
ton not possessed by any other Watering Place
Parties can be accommodated at Il short notice
with dinners, collations, Ice creams, &c. SC.


No oexc.tons shall be spared by the Proprietor,
to CRAFTY every want OF the visitor to this pleas
ant and sa,ubrous Retreat.


Charges will be moderate.


CHARLES STANLEY.

MODE OF DRAWING.


The numbers will be put into one wheel as u
sual-.and in the other wheel will be put the pri-
zcs above S5, and the drawing to progress in the
usual manner The 5000 prizes Of - to be a.
warded to the tickets, the numbers Of which end
with the terminating figure of either Of the three
first drawn numbers OF different examinations.
The five dollar prizes TO be awarded to the tick
cts having the two last figures corresponding
with the two last figures of such number of the
next drawn Of different termination. This mode
will permit the whole lottery 70 be completed in
one dra ing,and ticket drawing superior prize
will not be restricted from drawing an inferior one
also.
